### Completion Checklist

#### Required Documents

<!-- Add more as needed -->

#### Cross-Document Validation
- [ ] No contradictions between documents
- [ ] All cross-references are valid
- [ ] Terminology consistent with GLOSSARY.md
- [ ] Technology versions match TECH-STACK.md
- [ ] Alignment with product vision verified
- [ ] Alignment with system architecture verified

#### Quality Checks
- [ ] All documents have complete version headers
- [ ] All documents have Status: Approved
- [ ] No TODO/TBD placeholders remaining
- [ ] All internal links working
- [ ] Examples and diagrams included where needed
- [ ] Beginner-friendly explanations present

#### Dependencies
- [ ] All dependencies from previous phases exist
- [ ] No forward dependencies on future phases
- [ ] External dependencies documented

#### Review Status
- [ ] Folder owner review complete
- [ ] Security review complete (if applicable)
- [ ] Cross-functional review complete (if applicable)
- [ ] Engineering Lead final review complete
